item.title: My Stab at Using Ai for Productivity
item.description: My ai usecases Purchasing AI - Using It as API vs Monthly Subscription for ChatGPT/Claude Do you need to buy monthly subscriptions? Take Copilot and other examples. To test this out, I bought $5 worth of usage from OpenAI, used an extension for VSCode for ai operations, and used ai tools that require api token..like AI Commits. Did it work? Yes. Have I used all of those $5? No, it’s still there.
